# [Interview #690: Twitter: Brandonothology collection, Entry #4](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=690#4)

#### kikastrophe

Any idea how many books will be in the series?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Tor asked me not to lock myself into a length. But I plotted
*Kings*
at 10 books.
